data.comment: The match is underway. Zulte have kicked-off.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Charleroi kick-off.
Zulte make their first substitution with William Bianda replacing Laurens De Bock.
Kaveh Rezaei puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 77, Francky Dury (Zulte) is making a second substitution, with Jean-Luc Dompe replacing Saido Berahino.
Abdoulaye Sissako is on a sub for Jannes Van Hecke for Zulte.
The away team have replaced Kaveh Rezaei with Frank Tsadjout. This is the first substitution made today by Karim Belhocine.
In the minute 84, Steeven Willems (Charleroi) has received a yellow card from Jan Boterberg.
Charleroi take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Shamar Nicholson.
Lucas Ribeiro is replacing Ali Gholizadeh for Charleroi at Regenboogstadion.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
